channel.title: Black Mesa Source Let's Play
channel.description:
Hello everyone. I've been doing commentaries and let's plays for slightly over a year now and I'm starting to enjoy it a lot more lately. I played all of Half-Life 2, but never the original so this mod looks absolutely perfect.
I've started a playthrough of Black Mesa Source on my youtube channel, so I thought I would go ahead and post it here as well.
Hope you guys enjoy and feedback would be much appreciated, thanks :slight_smile:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vpgY4eMMeHQ&list=UUa0ABG5jDm3IGlfbeM5fkIw&index=1&feature=plcp[/url]
